verses.verse: And you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> you a sharp <S%H2299><s%> knife, <S%H2719><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> you a barber's <S%H1532><s%> razor, <S%H8593><s%> and cause it to pass <S%H5674><s%> on your head <S%H7218><s%> and on your beard: <S%H2206><s%> then take <S%H3947><s%> you balances <S%H3976><s%> to weigh, <S%H4948><s%> and divide <S%H2505><s%> the hair.

You shall burn <S%H1197><s%> with fire <S%H217><s%> a third <S%H7992><s%> part in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> when the days <S%H3117><s%> of the siege <S%H4692><s%> are fulfilled: <S%H4390><s%> and you shall take <S%H3947><s%> a third <S%H7992><s%> part, and smite <S%H5221><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> it with a knife: <S%H2719><s%> and a third <S%H7992><s%> part you shall scatter <S%H2219><s%> in the wind; <S%H7307><s%> and I will draw <S%H7324><s%> out a sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them.
You shall also take <S%H3947><s%> thereof a few <S%H4592><s%> in number, <S%H4557><s%> and bind <S%H6887><s%> them in your skirts. <S%H3671><s%>

Then take <S%H3947><s%> of them again, <S%H5750><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> them in the fire; <S%H784><s%> for thereof shall a fire <S%H784><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> into <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> I have set <S%H7760><s%> it in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> and countries <S%H776><s%> that are round <S%H5439><s%> about her.

And she has changed <S%H4171><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> into wickedness <S%H7564><s%> more <S%H4481><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and my statutes <S%H2708><s%> more <S%H4481><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the countries <S%H776><s%> that are round <S%H5439><s%> about her: for they have refused <S%H3988><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> and my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> they have not walked <S%H1980><s%> in them.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> you multiplied <S%H1995><s%> more <S%H4481><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round <S%H5439><s%> about you, and have not walked <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have kept <S%H6213><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have done <S%H6213><s%> according to the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round <S%H5439><s%> about you;

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I, even <S%H1571><s%> I, am against <S%H5921><s%> you, and will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H4941><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

And I will do <S%H6213><s%> in you that which <S%H834><s%> I have not done, <S%H6213><s%> and whereunto <S%H834><s%> I will not do <S%H6213><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> the like, <S%H3644><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> the fathers <S%H1><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you, and the sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> their fathers; <S%H1><s%> and I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in you, and the whole <S%H3605><s%> remnant <S%H7611><s%> of you will I scatter <S%H2219><s%> into all <S%H3605><s%> the winds. <S%H7307><s%>

Why, <S%H3651><s%> as I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Surely, <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> you have defiled <S%H2930><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your detestable <S%H8251><s%> things, and with all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations, <S%H8441><s%> therefore will I also <S%H1571><s%> diminish <S%H1639><s%> you; neither <S%H1571><s%> shall my eye <S%H5869><s%> spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I have any pity. <S%H2550><s%>

A third <S%H7992><s%> part of you shall die <S%H4191><s%> with the pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> and with famine <S%H7458><s%> shall they be consumed <S%H3615><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you: and a third <S%H7992><s%> part shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about you; and I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> a third <S%H7992><s%> part into all <S%H3605><s%> the winds, <S%H7307><s%> and I will draw <S%H7324><s%> out a sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them.

Thus shall my anger <S%H639><s%> be accomplished, <S%H3615><s%> and I will cause my fury <S%H2534><s%> to rest <S%H5117><s%> on them, and I will be comforted: <S%H5162><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it in my zeal, <S%H7068><s%> when I have accomplished <S%H3615><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> in them.

Moreover I will make <S%H5414><s%> you waste, <S%H2723><s%> and a reproach <S%H2781><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round <S%H5439><s%> about you, in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that pass <S%H5674><s%> by.

So it shall be a reproach <S%H2781><s%> and a taunt, <S%H1422><s%> an instruction <S%H4148><s%> and an astonishment <S%H8047><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round <S%H5439><s%> about you, when I shall execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in you in anger <S%H639><s%> and in fury <S%H2534><s%> and in furious <S%H2534><s%> rebukes. <S%H8433><s%> I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.

When I shall send <S%H7971><s%> on them the evil <S%H7451><s%> arrows <S%H2671><s%> of famine, <S%H7458><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall be for their destruction, <S%H4889><s%> and which <S%H834><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> you: and I will increase <S%H3254><s%> the famine <S%H7458><s%> on you, and will break <S%H7665><s%> your staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread: <S%H3899><s%>

So will I send <S%H7971><s%> on you famine <S%H7458><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts, <S%H2416><s%> and they shall bereave <S%H7921><s%> you: and pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pass <S%H5674><s%> through you; and I will bring <S%H935><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> on you. I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.
